teams.name: Northeast Florida people who can give
teams.loan_because: We can and care enough to give.
teams.description: We are a plethora of people. Male, female, gay,  straight,  bisexual, transgender, and all races of people who care enough to give when able.

teams.name: Africa's Tomorrow
teams.loan_because: We are all citizens of this world and we all depend on each other.  No one can do it alone. Those who are lucky enough to have the means also have a responsibility to those without.
teams.description: People from around the globe, uniting to help each other and make this world a better place for all.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.
